event.title: 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Vernamiège, Nax and Mase merged

data.event: On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Vernamiège, Nax and Mase merged in the new municipality of Mont-Noble.
Mase is first mentioned about 1100 as villa Magis.
Until 1902 it was known as Mage.
